#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int hh, mm;
        scanf("%d %d", &hh, &mm);
        if(hh>=24 || mm>=60 || hh<0 || mm<0)
            printf("Invalid Time\n");
        else
        {
            float hh_minute=(float)hh+(float)mm/60.0;
            if(hh_minute>=12)
                hh_minute=hh_minute-12;
            hh_minute=hh_minute*5;
            float ans;
            if(hh_minute>(float)mm)
                ans=(hh_minute-(float)mm)*6;
            else
                ans=((float)mm-hh_minute)*6;
            ans=min(ans, 360.0f-ans);
            printf("%.1f\n", ans);
        }
    }
}
